member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.FeatureCollectionExtensions.Get``1(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection)
member.summary: Retrieves the requested feature from the collection.
member.returns: The requested feature, or null if it is not present.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.FeatureCollectionExtensions.Set``1(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection,``0)
member.summary: Sets the given feature in the collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of HTTP features.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Indicates if the collection can be modified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection.Revision
member.summary: Incremented for each modification and can be used to verify cached results.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.IFeatureCollection.Item(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets or sets a given feature. Setting a null value removes the feature.
member.returns: The requested feature, or null if it is not present.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.ITlsConnectionFeature.ClientCertificate
member.summary: Synchronously retrieves the client certificate, if any.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.ITlsConnectionFeature.GetClientCertificateAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves the client certificate, if any.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.ITlsTokenBindingFeature
member.summary: Provides information regarding TLS token binding parameters.
member.remarks: TLS token bindings help mitigate the risk of impersonation by an attacker in the event an authenticated client's bearer tokens are somehow exfiltrated from the client's machine. See https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-popov-token-binding/ for more information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.ITlsTokenBindingFeature.GetProvidedTokenBindingId
member.summary: Gets the 'provided' token binding identifier associated with the request.
member.returns: The token binding identifier, or null if the client did not supply a 'provided' token binding or valid proof of possession of the associated private key. The caller should treat this identifier as an opaque blob and should not try to parse it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.Features.ITlsTokenBindingFeature.GetReferredTokenBindingId
member.summary: Gets the 'referred' token binding identifier associated with the request.
member.returns: The token binding identifier, or null if the client did not supply a 'referred' token binding or valid proof of possession of the associated private key. The caller should treat this identifier as an opaque blob and should not try to parse it.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.IHeaderDictionary.Item(System.String)
member.summary: IHeaderDictionary has a different indexer contract than IDictionary, where it will return StringValues.Empty for missing entries.
member.returns: The stored value, or StringValues.Empty if the key is not present.
